xmp_schema.description: $$$/xmp/pdf_description=This schema specifies properties used with Adobe PDF documents.
xmp_schema.label: $$$/xmp/pdf_label=Adobe PDF

xmp_property.name: PDFVersion
xmp_property.description: $$$/xmp/pdf/PDFVersion_description=The PDF file version (for example: 1.0, 1.3, and so on).
xmp_property.label: $$$/xmp/pdf/PDFVersion_label=PDFVersion

xmp_property.name: Producer
xmp_property.description: $$$/xmp/pdf/Producer_description=The name of the tool that created the PDF document.
xmp_property.label: $$$/xmp/pdf/Producer_label=Producer
